about_the_game:
In Reaper Rules, you will switch between two characters with distinct perspectives that completely change the gameplay style and your approach to victory. Get ready to face challenging levels, epic bosses, and an engaging narrative full of choices and surprises. Discover the purpose of each character as they fight to save those they love.

Two Perspectives, Two Experiences:

Embark on a journey focused on narrative, where interpreting the characters’ points of view is essential. The game blends platforming action with top-down gameplay, thanks to the two protagonists who each have unique camera styles and abilities.

  • Side-Scrolling Perspective (Asso): Take on platforming levels, defeat enemies, and face brutal bosses, all while following the rules set by the Reaper. Armed with a scythe, you’ll battle enemies for a greater purpose, trying to escape a mysterious place... but where exactly? No spoilers here! 😉

  • Top-Down Perspective (Jake): Shoot enemies from all directions and transform into a powerful creature to destroy everything in your path. Surviving these challenges will be key to understanding your motivations and reaching your goals.

A Deep Story:

Reaper Rules isn’t just an action-adventure game. It offers a captivating narrative that blends violence, drama, tough choices, and triumph. Dive into the motivations of the characters as they attempt to escape the virtual world that traps them.

Key Features:

  • Varied Gameplay: Switch between side-scrolling and top-down perspectives, with entirely different levels and challenges.

  • Action and Adventure: Use the scythe, shoot enemies, and face bosses that will test your skills to the very end of the journey.

  • Intriguing Story: A rich narrative with alternative choices and dramatic moments that affect the characters’ fate.

  • Humor and Surprises: Unexpected twists and witty jokes that will keep you glued to the screen.

Are you ready to uncover the secrets and escape this deadly game?

  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM

short_description: Fight, solve levels, and face bosses as you switch between the side-scrolling perspective of the Reaper (with his sharp scythe) and the top-down view of a boy who transforms into an okapi (don’t ask why). Experience a story full of action, drama, and humor.
